title: Notification Configuration Example
description: Comprehensive example of notification configuration with all available options

_comments.Enabled: Set to false to disable all notifications globally
_comments.Smtp.Host: SMTP server hostname or IP address
_comments.Smtp.EnableSsl: Enable SSL/TLS encryption for secure connection
_comments.Smtp.Username: SMTP authentication username (leave empty if not required)
_comments.Smtp.Password: SMTP authentication password (leave empty if not required)
_comments.Smtp.FromDisplayName: Display name shown in email client
_comments.Smtp.MaxRetryAttempts: Number of retry attempts on failure (0-10)
_comments.DefaultRecipients: Recipients for all notifications (can be overridden by rules)
_comments.Rules: Notification rules for different event types
_comments.Rules.Type: TestStart, TestSuccess, TestFailure, CriticalFailure, or ReportGenerated
_comments.Rules.Recipients: List of email addresses to receive this notification
_comments.Rules.IsEnabled: Enable or disable this specific rule
_comments.Rules.CooldownPeriod: Minimum time between notifications (format: HH:MM:SS or null for no cooldown)
_comments.Rules.Conditions: Additional conditions for when this rule should apply (key-value pairs)
